customerAddedDisposals.description: Residential property disposals that weren't reported via the 'Report and pay Capital Gains Tax on UK property' service and submitted by the customer into ITSA.

submittedOn.description: The date the residential property disposals were submitted, in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ`

disposals.description: An array of residential property disposals.
